metadata.title: CVE-2018-19105 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
LibreCAD 2.1.3 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (0x89C04589 write access violation and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-19105` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

librecad - 2.1.3-1.1
librecad-data - 2.1.3-1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: librecad package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.1.3-1.1').
